properties.$innerHTML: 'What is DiasporaID and How Was it Born'

'Diaspora Engagement for Socio-Economic Development in Lebanon is a United States Agency for International Development (USAID) funded activity that, as the name implies, aims to support the continued economic and social development of Lebanon by activating the underutilized potential of the Lebanese global diaspora.'

'To support this program - Netways, a leading Lebanese IT and development company - conceived and built DiasporaID. As a novel digital platform, DiasporaID was built from the ground up to strengthen  or rekindle - the connection between the Lebanese diaspora with their hometowns and homeland, providing digital means for purposeful engagement and collaborative action towards Lebanons development.'

'DiasporaID leverages the Lebanese peoples cultural tendency drawing them to work with their fellow countrymen, be it in the same city or halfway across the globe. By linking diaspora members with residents, institutions and businesses in their ancestral towns - and with fellow diaspora members sharing similar interests and working in similar sectors - DiasporaID facilitates collaborative action between Lebanese residents and expats for the mutual benefit of their businesses and communities.'

'The DiasporaID platform and this website were made possible with the support of the American people through the United States Agency for International Development (USAID). The website content is under the responsibility of Netways, and does not directly reflect the views of USAID or the United States Government.'

events.click:
dataSource?.fromAffiliationAction  ? linkOrganizationAsAffiliation(item, dataSource) 
    : (dataSource?.fromTradeOfficeAction ? 
        linkCompanyToDiplomatic(item,dataSource)
        : (dataSource?.fromBranchAction ? 
            addParentBranch(item, dataSource) 
              : item.canCreateRole ? 
                $actionHelper.navigateTo('profile/addCompanyRole/' + item.id, {'companyId': item.id, 'name': item.title, 'image': item.image, userId: initialDataSource.profileId, fromSearchPage: true}) 
                : $actionHelper.showToast('You already have a role in this company')
          )
      )

dataSource?.fromAffiliationAction  ? linkOrganizationAsAffiliation(item, dataSource) 
    : (dataSource?.fromTradeOfficeAction ? 
        linkCompanyToDiplomatic(item,dataSource)
        : (dataSource?.fromBranchAction ? 
          addParentBranch(item, dataSource) 
          : item.canCreateRole ? 
            $actionHelper.navigateTo('profile/addCompanyRole/' + item.id, {'companyId': item.id, 'name': item.title, 'image': item.image, userId: initialDataSource.profileId, fromSearchPage: true})
              : $actionHelper.showToast('You already have a role in this company')
          )
      )

properties.title: $actionHelper.getSearchInputValue()
properties.subtitle: 'Tap here to setup a new organization'

events.click:
dataSource?.fromAffiliationAction  ? linkCompanyAsAffiliation(item, dataSource) 
    : (dataSource?.fromAmbassadorialNetworkAction ?
      linkOrganizationToDiplomatic(item,dataSource)                      
      :(dataSource?.fromChapterAction ?
        addParentChapter(item, dataSource) 
        : item.canCreateRole ? 
          $actionHelper.navigateTo('profile/addOrganizationRole/' + item.id, {'organizationId': item.id, 'name': item.title, 'image': item.image, userId: initialDataSource.profileId, fromSearchPage: true})
          : $actionHelper.showToast('You already have a role in this organization')
        )
      )

dataSource?.fromAffiliationAction  ? linkCompanyAsAffiliation(item, dataSource) 
    : (dataSource?.fromAmbassadorialNetworkAction ?
        linkOrganizationToDiplomatic(item,dataSource)                      
      :(dataSource?.fromChapterAction ?
        addParentChapter(item, dataSource) 
          : item.canCreateRole ? 
              $actionHelper.navigateTo('profile/addOrganizationRole/' + item.id, {'organizationId': item.id, 'name': item.title, 'image': item.image, userId: initialDataSource.profileId, fromSearchPage: true})
              : null
        )
      )

$dynamicUiExtraService.mapUserRolesToItem:
function(x, cityOfOriginId) {  const entityRoleType = this.getEntityRoleType(x);
  const role = {
    ...x, 
    id: entityRoleType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
            ? this.getEntityOrganizationId(x) : 
                entityRoleType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                  ? this.getEntityDiplomaticMissionId(x) : this.getEntityRoleId(x),  

    receiverMailboxId: entityRoleType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
            ? this.getOrganizationReceiverMailboxId(x) : 
                entityRoleType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                  ? this.getDiplomaticMissionReceiverMailboxId(x) : this.getReceiverMailboxId(x),  

    type: entityRoleType === 'OrganizationCommittee' ? 'Organization' : entityRoleType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' ? 'DiplomaticMission' : entityRoleType,
    title: this.getEntityRoleName(x),
    parentTitle: entityRoleType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
            ? this.getEntityOrganizationName(x) : 
                entityRoleType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                  ? this.getEntityDiplomaticMissionName(x) : this.getEntityRoleName(x), 

    thumbnailImage: entityRoleType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
            ? this.getEntityOrganizationImage(x) : 
                entityRoleType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                  ? this.getEntityDiplomaticMissionImage(x) : this.getEntityRoleImage(x), 

    coverImage: "assets/images/dynamic-ui/default-cover-image.jpg",
    hasAdminRole: entityRoleType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
            ? this.checkIfHasAdminEntityOrganizationRole(x) : 
                entityRoleType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                  ? this.checkIfHasAdminEntityDiplomaticRole(x) : this.checkIfHasAdminEntityRole(x), 
        
    postUrl: entityRoleType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
            ? this.getPostUrl('Organization', this.getEntityOrganizationId(x)) : 
                entityRoleType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                  ? this.getPostUrl('DiplomaticMission', this.getEntityDiplomaticMissionId(x)) : this.getPostUrl(entityRoleType, this.getEntityRoleId(x)) 
  }

  role.conversationUrl = 'conversationMessages/' + _.camelCase(role.type) + '/' + role.id + '/' + initialDataSource.userMailboxId + '/' + role.receiverMailboxId;

  role.inviteParametes = this.getDomainInviteInfo(entityRoleType === 'Municipality' ? cityOfOriginId : role.id, role.type, role.title, role.thumbnailImage);
  
  return role;
}

$dynamicUiExtraService.mapNetworRoleToItem:
function(x) {  const networkType = this.getNetworkType(x);
  const roleName = this.getNetworkPositionName(x);
  const positionName =  roleName ?  (roleName.toLowerCase() === 'electedmember' ? 'Elected Member' : (roleName.toLowerCase() === 'ambassador' && _.get(x, "entity.__typename", "") === 'Municipality') ? 'Town Ambassador' :  roleName.toLowerCase() === 'vicepresident' ? 'Vice President' : roleName) : "";

  return {
      ...x, 
      id: this.getNetworkId(x), 
      type: networkType, 
      title: this.getNetworkName(x), 
      subTitle: positionName, 
      featured: this.getNetworkIsFeatured(x),
      parentDomainId: networkType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
              ? this.getOrganizationNetworkId(x) : 
                  networkType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                    ? this.getDiplomaticNetworkId(x) : this.getNetworkId(x), 
      parentDomainType: networkType === 'OrganizationCommittee' ? 'Organization' : networkType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' ? 'DiplomaticMission' : networkType,                           
      image: networkType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
              ? this.getOrganizationCommitteeImage(x) : 
                  networkType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                    ? this.getDiplomaticMissionOfficeImage(x) : this.getNetworkImage(x), 
      canFollow: networkType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
                  ? this.getOrganizationCommitteeFollowAction(x)
                    : ((networkType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee') ? this.getDiplomaticOfficeFollowAction(x) : this.getNetworkFollowAction(x)), 
      canUnFollow: networkType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
                  ? this.getOrganizationCommitteeUnFollowAction(x)
                    : ((networkType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee') ? this.getDiplomaticOfficeUnFollowAction(x) : this.getNetworkUnFollowAction(x)), 

      tagOneIcon: networkType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
                    ? this.getOrganizationCommitteeCountry(x) : 
                        networkType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                          ? this.getDiplomaticMissionOfficeCountry(x) : 
                              networkType === 'Municipality' 
                                ? this.getMunicipalityCountryCode(x): this.getNetworkCountry(x),             
      tagOneLabel: networkType === 'OrganizationCommittee' 
                    ? this.getOrganizationCommitteeCity(x) : 
                        networkType === 'DiplomaticMissionCommittee' 
                          ? this.getDiplomaticMissionOfficeCity(x) : 
                              networkType === 'Municipality' 
                                ? this.getMunicipalityCountryName(x) : this.getNetworkCity(x),               
      positionName: positionName, 
      positionType: this.getNetworkRoleName(x),
      canUpdateRole: this.checkIfCanUpdateNetworkRole(x),
      canFeatureRole: this.checkIfCanFeatureNetworkRole(x),
      canUnFeatureRole: this.checkIfCanUnFeatureNetworkRole(x),
      canRemoveRole: this.checkIfCanRemoveNetworkRole(x)
  }
}

    actorName: updateOwnerType === 'User' ? this.getUpdateUserOwnerName(x)  : this.getUpdateEntityOwnerName(x),
    actorImage: this.getUpdateOwnerImage(x)
  }
}

$dynamicUiExtraService.mapFavoriteCardToItem:
function (x) {  const favoriteType = this.getFavoriteType(x);
  return {
    ...x,
    id: this.getFavoriteId(x),
    type: favoriteType, 
    title: favoriteType === 'Offer' ? this.getFavoriteName(x) : this.getFavoriteTitle(x),
    subTitle: favoriteType === 'Offer' ? (this.getFavoriteDate(x) + '  ' + _.camelCase(this.getFavoriteOfferType(x)))  : (this.getFavoriteDate(x) + '  by ' + this.getFavoriteCreatorName(x)), 
    date: this.getFavoriteDate(x),
    image: this.getFavoriteImage(x),
    showImage: (favoriteType === 'Post' && this.getFavoriteImage(x)) || (favoriteType === 'Event') || (favoriteType === 'Offer') ? true : false,

    creatorId: this.getFavoriteCreatorId(x),
    creatorName: this.getFavoriteCreatorName(x),
    creatorImage: this.getFavoriteCreatorImage(x),

    actorId: (favoriteType === 'Offer') ?  this.getFavoriteOfferOwnerId(x) : this.getFavoriteOwnerId(x),
    actorName: (favoriteType === 'Offer') ? this.getFavoriteOfferOwnerName(x) : (this.getFavoriteOwnerType(x) === 'User' ? this.getFavoriteOwnerUserName(x) :  this.getFavoriteOwnerName(x)),
    actorImage: (favoriteType === 'Offer') ? this.getFavoriteOfferOwnerImage(x)  : this.getFavoriteOwnerImage(x)
  }
}
$dynamicUiExtraService.getDomainInviteInfo:
function (domainEntityId, domainEntityType, domainEntityName, domainEntityImage) {  switch (domainEntityType) {

      return {
        'sharingMessage': this.$dynamicUiVariables.initialDataSource.firstName + ' ' + this.$dynamicUiVariables.initialDataSource.lastName + ' is inviting you to list your profile on ' + domainEntityName + '. Join the team, get updates and explore business opportunities!', 
        'sharingPhotoUrl': domainEntityImage,
        'sharingDescription': 'The Global Lebanese Business Network',
        'sharingTitle': 'Join the '  + domainEntityName + ' Team on DiasporaID',
        'targetId': domainEntityId,
        'targetMethod': 'DiasporaCompany'
      }

    case 'Organization': 
      return {
        'sharingMessage': 'List your profile with the organization page on DiasporaID alongside influential Lebanese people from the diaspora. Network with your organization members, get updates and be part of the community! ',
        'sharingPhotoUrl': domainEntityImage,
        'sharingDescription': 'The Global Lebanese Network',
        'sharingTitle': 'Join ' + domainEntityName + ' on DiasporaID',
        'targetId': domainEntityId,
        'targetMethod': 'DiasporaOrganization'
      }

    case 'Municipality': 
      return {
        'sharingMessage': this.$dynamicUiVariables.initialDataSource.firstName + ' ' + this.$dynamicUiVariables.initialDataSource.lastName +  ' is inviting you to visit the global community of ' + domainEntityName + ' on DiasporaID. Contact the municipality or mukhtars. Meet influential diaspora members, dont miss out!', 
        'sharingPhotoUrl': domainEntityImage,
        'sharingTitle': this.$dynamicUiVariables.initialDataSource.firstName + ' ' + this.$dynamicUiVariables.initialDataSource.lastName + ' Is Inviting You to ' + domainEntityName + ' on DiasporaID',
        'sharingDescription': 'The Global Lebanese Network',
        'targetId': domainEntityId,
        'targetMethod': 'InviteToTown'
      }

    case 'DiplomaticMission': 
      return {
        'sharingMessage': this.$dynamicUiVariables.initialDataSource.firstName + ' ' + this.$dynamicUiVariables.initialDataSource.lastName + ' and thousands of influential Lebanese diaspora have already registered on the page. Contact the diplomatic mission, get updates and be part of the community. Dont miss out!', 
        'sharingPhotoUrl': domainEntityImage,
        'sharingTitle': 'Join ' + domainEntityName + ' on DiasporaID',
        'sharingDescription': 'The Global Lebanese Network', 
        'targetId': domainEntityId,
        'targetMethod': 'DiasporaDiplomatic'
    }
